title: The Daily Show Podcast Universe Episode 4: Pod Save Little Creek Elementary (Rebroadcast)
itunes:title: The Daily Show Podcast Universe Episode 4: Pod Save Little Creek Elementary (Rebroadcast)
description:
Three 9-year-old co-hosts - Jonny, Tommy, and Isabelle - lead the resistance against their authoritarian principal. Features Daily Show correspondent Dulcé Sloan. Originally aired February 3, 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
